profile:
Business Description:     Homeowners with clogged dryer vents typically experience longer drying cycles resulting in $18-$24 more per month in energy costs. Additionally, over 15,000 dryer fires occur each year, with failure to clean being the leading factor. The trained professionals at Dryer Vent Wizard specialize in cleaning, repairing, altering and installing dryer vent lines. It’s all we do, so we have the right knowledge, tools and techniques to do the job right. An informed decision is the best decision.

Services Offered:             Cleaning, repairing, replacing, and installing clothes dryer vents.

Services Not Offered:    Air duct or chimney cleaning or clothes dryer repair.

profile:
Kurt’s Appliance Repair proudly serving Waterloo, Kitchener, Cambridge, and Guelph

If you are in need of commercial appliance repair service in the Waterloo region residential services then we are here to help you! We offer a full line of appliance repairs in Waterloo region such as refrigerator repair, icemaker repair, freezer repair, washing machine repair, dishwasher repair, cooktop repair and clothes dryer repair. If you are having trouble with any of your appliances then you should give us a call today. Why spend money on new appliances when you can affordably repair your current appliances for far less when hiring appliance repair services to perform the repairs for you.
